section.name: Karma R1.1
section.p: This release is primarily meant to implement left-overs from Karma R1.0 (the non-blocking ones), such as fine tuning documentation, performance tuning, stuff that users have come up with and is considered usefull as well as high priority, etc.
Most likely, we'll implement Subversion support as well.
